amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 118-464 to clarify that Section 2 shall not limit a governmental entity's ability to obtain information that would be obtainable without a warrant.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to clarify that section 2 of the bill shall not limit a governmental entity's ability to obtain information that would be obtainable without a warrant.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaLota amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 246, 1 Present (Roll no. 135).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the LaLota amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 246, 1 Present (Roll no. 135).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
